body.p: The following are examples of symbols used on the reactor or accessories to alert you to important information:

image.href: C:\Users\e9921013\backup\CURRENT PROJECTS\Work Requests\PDI Revisions\WR23092 to 23096 PDI Startup\WR23094\P-164001099 Current-Limiting Reactor Reactor 2000-2500A Installation Manual R02\Graphics\specSymElectricShock.pdf

entry.p: RISK OF ELECTRIC SHOCK - Observe the warning associated with the risk of electric shock symbol.

image.href: C:\Users\e9921013\backup\CURRENT PROJECTS\Work Requests\PDI Revisions\WR23092 to 23096 PDI Startup\WR23094\P-164001099 Current-Limiting Reactor Reactor 2000-2500A Installation Manual R02\Graphics\specSymCaution.pdf

entry.p: CAUTION: REFER TO OPERATOR'S MANUAL - Refer to your operator's manual for additional information, such as important operating and maintenance instructions.

image.href: C:\Users\e9921013\backup\CURRENT PROJECTS\Work Requests\PDI Revisions\WR23092 to 23096 PDI Startup\WR23094\P-164001099 Current-Limiting Reactor Reactor 2000-2500A Installation Manual R02\Graphics\specSymBatteryDisposalWEEE.pdf

row.entry: This symbol indicates that you should not discard waste electrical or electronic equipment (WEEE) in the trash. For proper disposal, contact your local recycling/reuse or hazardous waste center.
